value.title: DAX Fridays! #51: AVERAGEX
value.excerpt: In today's video we will go through the measure AVERAGEX. It is not as simple as you think to calculate averages in DAX and in this video I explain why. value.title: DAX Fridays! #79: KEEPFILTERS
value.excerpt: In today's video we are going through the DAX function KEEPFILTERS. KEEPFILTERS will remove the behaviour that CALCULATE has where it removes the filters available. value.title: DAX Fridays! #96: MEDIAN, AVERAGE, MEAN, MODE | The Bill Gates Effect
